fields.name: Days
fields.description: how long this blob can be restored. It should be great than zero and less than DeleteRetentionPolicy.days.

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: Blob restore is enabled if set to true.

fields.name: LastEnabledTime
fields.description: Deprecated in favor of minRestoreTime property.

fields.name: MinRestoreTime
fields.description: Returns the minimum date and time that the restore can be started.
